## Change Summary
- What CI/CD aspects changed (workflows, triggers, runners, caching, permissions)

## Motivation
- Why the change is needed (speed, reliability, security, cost)

## Impact
- Developer workflow, release cadence, branch strategy
- Runtime changes (if applicable)

## Security & Permissions
- Secrets/tokens/permissions used or modified
- Principle of least privilege applied

## Rollback Strategy
- How to revert safely; manual steps if required

## Validation
- Dry runs or test runs links
- Expected outcomes and how verified

## Related Issues / Links
- N/A

## Checklist
- [ ] Workflows tested in a fork or with `workflow_dispatch`
- [ ] Required secrets documented and present
- [ ] Cache keys/versioning considered
- [ ] Concurrency/cancellation configured appropriately
